idea-plugin.name: Event Horizon Theme
idea-plugin.description:
A theme for the lonely spaceman drifting his way through the cosmos

Themes included:

  • Void - Black backgrounds, high contrast. The quintessential Event Horizon Theme experience.
  • Nebula - More vibrant colors
  • Galaxy - A more traditional dark theme
This theme is designed specifically for the following languages:
  • Java
  • Typescript/Javascript
  • Scala
  • HTML
  • CSS
  • JSON
  • XML
Other languages will still work, but are not guaranteed to have the best possible experience.

Based on the Trash Panda Theme by Jason Hulbert
